title: Data Download
description: Download landings data from the PeSKAS database with custom filters

filters.title: Filters
filters.countryHint: Changing the country will reset survey and area selections
filters.selectCountryFirst: Please select a country to see available surveys and administrative areas
filters.noCountryAssigned: No countries assigned to your user account. Please contact an administrator.
filters.statusHint: Validated data has been reviewed and approved
filters.surveysHint: Select one survey or leave empty for all
filters.gaulCodesHint: Select one area or leave empty for all

preview.title: Data Preview
preview.largeDatasetWarning: Large dataset ({{count}} rows). Download may take several minutes.

getStarted.title: Ready to Download Data
getStarted.description: Select your filters and click Preview Data to see a sample of the results before downloading.

errors.invalidDateRange: Invalid date range. 'Date From' must be before 'Date To'.
errors.previewFailed: Failed to load preview. Please check your filters and try again.
